title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration with the local LLM server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, allowing easy interaction with the Ollama server from Python scripts or notebooks.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, providing LLM, chat, and embeddings interfaces that plug into LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI) that offers ChatGPT-like interface, model management, and RAG support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, wrapping the REST API with fluent Java builders and supporting streaming responses.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama, offering idiomatic Ruby methods to chat and generate text with local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line wrapper written in Go that adds conversation history, prompt templates, and shell completion to the base Ollama CLI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin for VS Code that uses Ollama models for local inline code completion.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, letting Ollama models act as generators or rankers in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes and examples showing how to integrate Ollama with Python, JavaScript, Go, Rust, and data-science tools.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama server plus GPU acceleration (CUDA/ROCm) in containers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate that wraps the Ollama REST API with Tokio, providing strongly-typed request/response structs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+, with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency-injection friendly clients.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin multiplatform client for Ollama, usable from JVM, Android, and native targets with coroutines-based API.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama-based model fields, admin chat widgets, and REST endpoints for local LLM backends.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints and token-usage tracking on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers channel mentions using an Ollama model, with thread memory and per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.js bot integrating Ollama for chat and image-captioning in Discord servers, supporting streaming replies and model switching.
